title: Thunderbird Accounts Duplicating content of primary account
content:
Hello all,

I'm having trouble with a new Thunderbird install on a Win10 Pro PC laptop. I had to reinstall a perfectly working version due to a security upgrade/new profile at work.

The problem is that when adding multiple email accounts, the three accounts that are using the same service provider, i.e. @xfinity.com will install and validate properly, however the account inboxes all copy the Inbox content of the primary account and won't bring up the content from the individual account. I've added the accounts the same way as always (IMAP) and all of the server settings are correct for each individual account. Any idea why they're duplicating the primary account would be very helpful. TIA! (Install version 128.5.2esr (64-bit))
creator: skippyzmail

title: Error saving sent email and moving items between IMAP folders
content:
Like a number of others, I'm getting a lot of IMAP errors when sending email or moving it between folders. It seems like the IMAP connection is lost after 15-30 minutes and the only way to recover is restarting Thunderbird.

This is happening with Pair.com-hosted email in my case, and does not happen with Seamonkey. It's only been a problem with Thunderbird.

When the fault is triggered when sending email, the outbound message gets hung on the "Copying message to sent folder" step. Looking at TCPView, I'm not seeing any TCP connections from Thunderbird to the IMAP server:

thunderbird.exe 22264 TCP Altais 60613 localhost 60614 ESTABLISHED 2,227 2,227 thunderbird.exe 22264 TCP Altais 60614 localhost 60613 ESTABLISHED 2,227 2,227

If I hit cancel to escape, I get the message: "Your message was sent but a copy was not placed in your sent folder (Sent) due to network or file access errors. You can retry or save the message locally to Local Folders/Sent-Personal Account (IMAP).". If I then save to the local folder, moving it from there to the IMAP Sent folder fails until I restart Thunderbird.
creator: pstemari

title: MEB İnternetinde Mail Hesaplarına Bağlanamama Sorunu
content: Bir okulda müdür yardımcısıyım. Okullarda MEB Fatih projesine bağlı internet kullanılıyor ve bu internet ağında beyaz liste mantığıyla, liste dışında bırakılanlar filtreye takılarak açılmıyor. Bilgisayara thunderbird uygulamasını yükledim. Gmail hesabımı kendi telefonumdan bağladığım internetimle açmak istediğimde hiç problemsiz ve elle yapılandırmaya bile ihtiyaç duymadan açıyor. Fakat MEB internetine bağlıyken resimdeki şekilde sunucuya bağlanamama hatası veriyor. Normalde bu maillere tarayıcıdan rahatça girebiliyorum ve filtreye takılmıyor ama uygulama üzerinden açmaya çalıştığımda filtreye takılıyor ve sunucuya bağlanamıyor. Hadi telefonla kurulumu yaptım diyelim, sonrasında mail geldiğinde kendi internetimi bağlayana kadar mailler uygulamaya düşmüyor. İkinci resimde görüldüğü üzere, sistem üzerinden linkin beyaz listeye eklenmesi için talep oluşturabiliyorum fakat uygulama hangi linkler üzerinden sunucuya bağlanmaya çalışıyor ve hangi link filtreye takılıyor bunu bilemiyorum. Eğer bana bu konuda yardımcı olabilirseniz, ben de sisteme başvuru yapabilirim. Eğer açılırsa böylece MEB'e bağlı okullardaki bilgisayarlarda da uygulama kullanılabilir olacaktır. Bu arada bilgisayarımda Pardus işletim sistemi yüklü. Belki sorulacak bir şey varsa, buna göre sorarsınız diye özellikle belirtmek istedim.
creator: 30agustosilkokulu

title: Why does Thunderbird make Spam problems so complicated? It's too complicated. Why not give us the power to simply identify the Spammer? Why "Junk" and "Spam." If they're the same, why use two words? Why the need to "train?" The NERDS have taken over!!!
content: Believe me, the system is far too complicated, and you can see that by the pages required to explain the policy. I've tried numerous times to identify an email as SPAM, to no effect. It seems that Tbird cannot be trained. And this month, a dear friend whose email is on my Address list got sent to JUNK three different times with no action from me. Why? Why the need for a Bayesan method of training? It's ridiculous. It's not working. Does Tbird treat SPAM and JUNK the same way? If so, why two different names for the same thing? I think the programmers could spend their volunteered time in much more useful and helpful ways. I'm grateful for Tbird, but this SPAM issue is a very bad, annoying feature. Let us decide simply who the SPAM addresses are. If we make a mistake, that's our responsibility. No need for Tbird to be so patronizing. You're acting like this is too complicated for us and so you must protect us from ourselves. Typical B.S..

title: Primary account not on the list under Unified
content:
Hello All, I'm new to Thunderbird and here is something I'm wondering about: I created all my accounts and set everything to Unified ... all works fine. All 5 accounts show under "All Folders" ... if it's also checked, but I don't use it usually. In Unified view, however, UNDER the unified folders, my primary account is missing...?!? Again, I'm talking about the account list UNDER the unified folders! ... not the "All Folders" list! (if it's checked) (I usually don't have "All Folders" on)

The drop-down lists of the single unified folders, however, e.g. Inbox, Sent, etc., DO SHOW the primary account! (On a side note: under Drafts only four accounts show ...?)

So, why is the primary account missing in the list UNDER Unified folders ... (there are only four plus "Local Folders") but it is listed in the separate unified folders, if opened..? I hope explained it clear enough.

Please see attachments

BTW, at my home computer, ALL accounts are showing (in Unified view) under the unified folders. Please let me know what I did wrong or if I have to explain it better.

Thanks

title: modify attachment already in drafts - problem?
content:
Hello: w11p auto updated, tbird dev build 128.5.2 esr 64bit (only, no stable here!), so...1) I DON'T know if this is a "my" problem or a bug. I also don't know if this issue happens in stable. So, 2) Do I HAVE to use the top menu item - message>attachments>delete- (the attachment is already hilighted)?

What I needed to do: modify the already-attached pdfs to add signature.

-History: I learned the hard way that (apparently-- note the "me?" or bug, & dev build, above), that drag & drop* do not work. Moving on from that, I tried merely 1- highlighting the attachment, & hitting the delete key 2) using the R mouse button & using the "delete attachment" choice. 3) I may have tried other things but geezer excuse, sorry, I can't remember what else. They all failed, the attachments remained. 4) I ended up just creating a new msg, pasting the msg body into that new msg & editting the pdfs using Mozilla pdf built-in editor (Note: THANKS VERY MUCH, MOZ STAFF, FOR IMPLEMENTING PDF EDITOR!!!), then re-attaching the pdfs (always for this prob, as attachment).

  • ideally, what I wanted to do was merely drag the attachment to the desktop, edit it, then redrag & drop the editted pdf back into the t-bird attachment pane, and tbird would recognize this modified file & replace the old unmodified file w/the modified one. Absolutely no go on my try on this. (By "no go" here, I mean that the modified file wasn't there. The original pdf w/o signature stayed, the modified pdf w/signature added never got into attachments. File name remained the same.)

So, what do I want ? Simply for context & other non-top menu items to work, to mod or delete a file in attachments. Thank you, stay safe.
creator: linusr

title: Maintaining the account folders stops when reaching to trash bin
content:
Probably after the last update I am not able to simply do "Folder Maintenace" by File > Do Folder Mainenace. After doing this the process gives an error message:

"You cannot maintain the "Recycle Bin in xxx@xxx.net" folder because you cannot write to the folder. Check that you have enough disk space and write permissions to the folder and repeat the action.

This started to happen simultaneously on all my devices (two PCs, one notebook), all with updated Windows 11 and with last version of Thunderbird (128.5.2esr (64 bit) and also both in my personal and working mail domains. All of them are IMAP.

If I try to maintain only the trash bin separately, it takes a long time and finishes without any error message. But trying after that the complete maintain again fails.

I tried to delete trash files from the account profile on the disc and then it work. But only until I deleted any message. Then the problem ocurred again.

I am not sure whether I am doing good or bad to maintain folders regularly, but it was okay and without problems yet around month ago, not now.

Thank you, Michal

title: Remitente de mis correos (sender of my emails)
content:
Español: Quisiera hacer una consulta respecto al remitente de mis correos electrónicos. Descargué Thunderbird para utilizarlo con mi correo personal. Posteriormente incorporé al software mi correo institucional de donde yo trabajo, por lo que tenía disponible ambas cuentas en el software: mi correo personal y mi correo institucional.

Sin emabrgo, cuando enviaba correos electrónicos desde mi correo institucional, a los destinatarios les llegaban dichos correos desde mi cuenta de correo personal, siendo que yo había puesto como remitente mi correo institucional. Luego, desinstalé Thunderbird y lo reinstalé dejando sólo mi correo institucional. Pero al probar nuevamente enviando un correo electrónico, a mis destinatarios les seguía apareciendo mi correo personal como remitente.

Necesito ayuda al respecto.

Saludos

Inglés: I would like to ask a question regarding the sender of my emails. I downloaded Thunderbird to use with my personal email. Later I incorporated my institutional email from where I work into the software, so I had both accounts available in the software: my personal email and my institutional email.

However, when I sent emails from my institutional email, the recipients received these emails from my personal email account, even though I had set my institutional email as the sender. Then, I uninstalled Thunderbird and reinstalled it, leaving only my institutional email. But when I tried sending an email again, my personal email still appeared as the sender to my recipients.

I need help on this.

Greetings
creator: franco.galarce.arenas

title: Getting a photo from Thunderbird to my blog. Thid has always been easy, but suddenly has become difficult.
content: I frequently add a photo for mya pj blog (A Small Drop of Ink). I am trying to get a photo from a personal email (on Thunderbird). and just can't get it there, Please help me before I go insane.
